craftsmanlab-rules.title: CraftsmanLab Rules
craftsmanlab-rules.shortDescription: Rules and best practices for CraftsmanLab development. Code conventions, architecture, and methodologies.
craftsmanlab-rules.description:
This prompt was used to create the foundation of the CraftsmanLab website; I then enriched it to add certain architectural rules as development progressed.

You can use it as a base for your own developments.
